edu.flash3388.flashlib.robot.systems

Class DualPneumaticSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.flash3388.flashlib.robot.System
      • edu.flash3388.flashlib.robot.systems.DualPneumaticSystem

  • public class DualPneumaticSystem
extends System
    A basic pneumactic System composed of two double-solenoids. Can represent systems like the 2015 robot arms.
